Description: Maintenance and Customer Relations OfficerDescription:Incharge of following up Vehicle Maintenance matters with clients.Location:Alazraq, JordanResponsibilities:- Creating / Following up maintenance orders.- Recieving vehicles from clients, for maintenance and/or registration.- Coordinating with the maintenance team.- Returning the vehicle after completing job orders.- Properly control maintenace documents and procedures.- Any other deligations in the same field.Requierments:- Degree in Mechanical Engineering, or a similar related feild.- Minimum years of experience 5 years in vehicle maintenance.- Valid Driving Licence.Skills
